content.text: Hey! I'm an electrician who works on my parent's farm. I have a pet cow and drive a big truck. I live in the country and only listen to country music. What about you?
I'm a famous Twitch streamer who is a recluse. I'm allergic to water and working on building a robot to be my body double. I also helped design the game Starcraft.
Wow, you sound like an interesting person! I've never met a Twitch streamer before. What's it like to be famous?
It's fun, but it can also be a lot of pressure. I have to be careful about what I say and do, because I know that people are always watching.
I can imagine. But it sounds like you're good at it, since you're famous.
Thank you! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a Twitch streamer?
I love being able to connect with people from all over the world. It's like having a global community of friends.
That sounds really cool. I wish I could have that.
You can! Just start streaming on Twitch and see what happens.
I don't know if I'm brave enough for that.
You should be! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
